edu.sdsu.watcher.quake.io

Class FileIOHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.sdsu.watcher.quake.io.FileIOHelper

  • public final class FileIOHelper
extends java.lang.Object

    A simple static helper class that aides in common I/O operations such as:

    1. Directory creation
    2. File creation
    3. File writing
    4. File deletion

    This class utilizes the Java non-blocking I/O java.nio libraries to achieve better, thread-safe I/O operations.
